title: Vodafone Hotspot packet loss
body: Hs anyone had any trouble lately using their mobile phone as a hotspot to play league? i didnt have a problem last week and now,while waiting for internet to be connect at my new house, the client wont let me do anything (access the shop, black screen, cant go into queue. does anyone have any problems like this and have found a fix?

replies.body: Hi I have the exact same problem, I'm currently using my Vodafone phone as a tether to play LoL and other games and everything else is running smoothly but for some reason the client refuses to stay connected and i get a PVP.net error every 30 or so seconds, my workaround at the moment is to use my other USB internet to get into a game through the client then switch over to my phone for better ping, however this is not a sustainable solution, I'm hoping its just a minor issue with Vodafone and that it will blow over soon.
